Errors.Renown: Renown does not met the minimum Renown level for this upgrade.
Errors.Funds: Insufficient funds to purchase this upgrade.

FLABBERGASTED.CharacterArchetypeError: This character already have a archetype. Do you want to continue? If yes, it will clear all the information from the character. This is a destructive operation and there is no return.
FLABBERGASTED.CharacterSocialClubError: This character already have a social club. Do you want to continue? If yes, it will clear all the information from the character. This is a destructive operation and there is no return.
FLABBERGASTED.CharacterFlawError: This character already have a flaw. Do you want to continue? If yes, it will replace the current flaw by the new one.
FLABBERGASTED.UpdateImageArchetype: Do you want to update the character's image to the archetype's image?
FLABBERGASTED.TraitTooltip:
Use "Shift + Click" to increase the value.

Use "Alt/Options + Click" to decrease the value.

Click on the Trait to roll it.
FLABBERGASTED.StatusTooltip:
Use "Shift + Click" to increase the value.

Use "Alt/Options + Click" to decrease the value.
FLABBERGASTED.LuckyCoinTooltip:
Use "Shift + Click" on the coin to increase the value.

Use "Alt/Options + Click" on the coin to decrease the value.
FLABBERGASTED.NicknameTooltip:
Use "Click" to mark the nickname as used, if you have one.

Use "Alt/Options + Click" to mark it as unused.
FLABBERGASTED.SceneCuesTooltip:
Use "Right Click" to edit/delete.

Use "Click" to use the scene cue, if you have available usages.
